title: Caspar Health
description:
Use your therapist's knowledge at home:
• Your individual training plan is always available
• More effective therapy
• Further extensive support

Your individual training plan:
• Created by your therapist 
• Configured according to your personal needs

User-friendly training videos:
• Very easy to use
• Allow you to understand the correct exercise techniques enabling you to train well on your own

Monitor your therapy progress:
• Rate your exercises and note your progress
• Discuss results with your therapist

Get more in-depth therapy:
• Caspar allows you to exercise correctly with the appropriate intensity
• Helps you optimise your therapy for significant improvements

Submit your suggestions for improvements to support@caspar-health.com as we value your feedback.
